usage.cn: 与其诅咒黑暗，不如燃起蜡烛。没有人能给你光明，除了你自己。
usage.eng: It's be better to light up the candle than curse the darkness.No one can give you brightness expect yourself.

usage.cn: 你可以像疯狗那样对周围的一切愤愤不平，你可以诅咒命运，但是等到最后一刻到来之时，你还得平静的放手而去。
usage.eng: You can be as mad as a mad dog at the way things went, you can swear and curse the fates, but when it comes to the end, you have to let go.
